articles.title: Record Store Day 2020 postponed again and set to take place on three seperate dates - NME
articles.description: Record Store Day has been postponed yet again and will no longer be held on one day but across three months as a result of the coronavirus crisis.
articles.content:
Record Store Day 2020 has been postponed yet again, and will no longer be held on one day but on three separate dates as a result of the coronavirus crisis.
